data.title: E-Commerce Website
data.text: A versatile platform built on WordPress, designed for seamless and efficient online shopping experiences.

data.title: Fitness Website
data.text: A website howcasing our state-of-the-art facilities, expert trainers, and tailored fitness programs designed to help you achieve your health and wellness goals

data.title: Wedding Website
data.text: A single-page application with responsive design that highlights a professional Wedding invitation

data.title: Dashboard Thailand Resorts
data.text: An extensive analysis of resort offerings across different regions of Thailand. The data visualized includes factors like the distribution of resorts, price range, and the range of amenities provided in each region

data.title: Dashboard LA Crime
data.text: Analyze and visualize crime trends over time in Los Angeles. The dashboard presents an in-depth look at the various types of crimes committed, their frequency, and the temporal and geographical distribution of these incidents.

data.title: Portfolio Website
data.text: A portfolio website with responsive design that highlights professional work and services
